Verses: 1 avargal Ampipoli Pattanaththaiyum Appoloniyaa Pattanaththaiyum Kadandhu, Thesalonikke Pattanaththukku Vandhaargal; Ange Yoodharukku Oru Jebaaalayam Irundhadhu.
2 pavul Than Vazhakkaththinpadiye Avargalidaththil Poi, Moondru Oivunaatkalil Vedhavaakkiyangalin Niyaayangalai Eduththu Avargaludane Sambaashiththu,
3 kiristhu Paadupadavum Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhirukkavum Vendiyadhendrum, Naan Ungalukku Arivikkira Indha Yesuve Kiristhu Endrum Kaanbiththu, Thirushtaandhappaduththinaan.
4 avargalil Silarum, Bakthiyulla Girekkaril Thiralaana Janangalum, Ganamporundhiya Sthireegalil Anegarum Visuvaasiththu, Pavulaiyum Seelaavaiyum Sernthukondaargal.

5 visuvaasiyaadha Yoodhargal Vairaakkiyankondu Veenaraagiya Sila Pollaadhavargalaich Serththukkondu Koottankoodi, Pattanaththil Amaliyundaakki, Yaasonudaiya Veettai Valaindhukondu, Avargalaip Pattanaththaarukku Munbaaga Izhuththukkonduvara Vagaidhedinaargal.
6 avargalaik Kaanaamal, Yaasonaiyum Sila Sagodharaiyum Pattanaththu Adhigaarigalidaththil Izhuththukkonduvandhu: Ulagaththaik Kalakkugiravargal Ingeyum Vandhirukkiraargal.
7 ivargalai Yaason Etrukkondaan. Ivargalellaarum Yesu Ennum Veroruvanai Raajaa Endru Solli, Raayanudaiya Kattalaigalukku Virodhamaagach Seygiraargalendru Kookkuralittu,
8 ivaigalaik Kettukkondirundha Janangalaiyum Pattanaththu Adhigaarigalaiyum Kalangappanninaargal.
9 pinbu Avargal Yaasonidaththilum Matravargalidaththilum Jaameen Vaangikkondu, Avargalai Vittuvittaargal
10 udane Sagodharar Raaththirikaalaththile Pavulaiyum Seelaavaiyum Peroyaa Pattanaththukku Anuppivittaargal; Avargal Ange Serndhu, Yoodharudaiya Jebaaalayaththirkup Ponaargal.

11 andhap Pattanaththaar Manovaanjaiyaai Vasanaththai Etrukkondu, Kaariyangal Ippadiyirukkiradhaa Endru Thinandhorum Vedhavaakkiyangalai Aaraaindhupaarththadhinaal, Thesalonikkeyil Ullavargalaippaarkkilum Nargunasaaligalaayirundhaargal.
12 adhanaal Avargalil Anegamperum Ganamporundhiya Girekkaril Anega Sthireegalum Purushargalum Visuvaasiththaargal.
13 peroyaavilum Dhevavasanam Pavulinaal Arivikkappadugiradhendru Thesalonikkeyaraana Yoodhargal Arindhabodhu, Angeyum Vandhu, Janangalaik Kilappivittaargal.
14 udane Sagodharar Pavulaich Samuththiravazhiyaaip Poga Anuppivittaargal. Seelaavum Theemoththeyum Ange Thangiyirundhaargal.

15 pavulai Vazhinadaththinavargal Avanai Aththene Pattanamvaraikkum Azhaiththukkondupoi; Ange Seelaavum Theemoththeyum Adhiseekkiramaagath Thannidaththirku Varumpadi Avargalukkuch Sollak Kattalai Petrukkondu Purappattupponaargal.
16 aththene Pattanaththil Pavul Avargalukkaagak Kaaththukkondirukkaiyil, Andhap Pattanam Vikkiragangalaal Niraindhirukkiradhaik Kandu, Than Aaviyil Migundha Vairaakkiyamadaindhu,
17 jeba Aalayaththil Yoodharodum, Bakthiyullavargalodum, Sandhaiveliyil Edhirppattavargalodum Dhinandhorum Sambaashanaipanninaan

18 appozhudhu Eppikkoorarum Sthoyikkarumaana Gnaanigalil Silar Avanudane Vaakkuvaadhampanninaargal. Silar: Indha Vaayaadi Enna Pesappogiraan Endraargal. Silar: Ivan Anniya Dhevadhaigalai Arivikkiravanaagak Kaangiradhu Endraargal. Avan Yesuvaiyum Uyirththezhudhalaiyum Avargalukkup Pirasangiththapadiyinaale Appadich Sonnaargal.
19 avargal Avanai Maars Medaikku Azhaiththukkondupoi: Nee Sollugira Pudhidhaana Ubadhesam Innadhendru Naangal Ariyalaamaa?
20 noodhanamaana Kaariyangalai Engal Kaadhugal Ketkappannugiraai; Avaigalin Karuththu Innadhendru Ariya Manadhaayirukkirom Endraargal.
21 andha Aththene Pattanaththaarellaarum, Ange Thangugira Anniyarum, Navamaana Kaariyangalaich Sollugiradhilum Ketkiradhilumeyozhiya Verondrilum Pozhudhupokkugiradhillai.
22 appozhudhu Pavul Maars Medaiyin Naduvile Nindru: Aththenare, Endha Vishayaththilum Neengal Migundha Dhevadhaabakthiyullavargalendru (moodanambikkaiyullavargalendru) Kaangiren.

23 eppadiyendraal, Naan Sutriththirindhu, Ungal Aaraadhanaikkuriyavaigalaik Gavaniththup Paarththapozhudhu, Ariyappadaadha Dhevanukku Endru Ezhudhiyirukkira Oru Balibeedaththaik Kanden; Neengal Ariyaamal Aaraadhikkira Avaraiye Naan Ungalukku Arivikkiren.
24 ulagaththaiyum Adhilulla Yaavatraiyum Undaakkina Dhevanaanavar Vaanaththirkum Boomikkum Aandavaraayirukkirapadiyaal Kaigalinaal Kattappatta Kovilgalil Avar Vaasampannugiradhillai.
25 ellaarukkum Jeevanaiyum Suvaasaththaiyum Sagalaththaiyum Kodukkira Avar, Thamakku Yaadhondru Thevaiyaanadhupola, Manushar Kaigalaal Panividaikollugiradhumillai.

26 manushajaadhiyaana Sagala Janangalaiyum Avar Ore Raththaththinaale Thondrappanni, Boomiyinmeedhengum Kudiyirukkachseydhu, Mun Theermaanikkappatta Kaalangalaiyum Avargal Kudiyiruppin Ellaigalaiyum Kuriththirukkiraar;
27 karththaraagiya Thammai Avargal Thadaviyaagilum Kandupidikkaththakkadhaagath Thammaith Thedumpadikku Appadich Seydhaar; Avar Nammil Oruvarukkum Dhooramaanavarallave.
28 enenil Avarukkul Naam Pizhaikkirom, Asaigirom, Irukkirom; Appadiye Ungal Pulavargalilum Silar: Naam Avarudaiya Sandhadhiyaar Endru Solliyirukkiraargal.
29 naam Dhevanudaiya Sandhadhiyaayirukka, Manusharudaiya Siththiravelaiyilum Yukthiyinaalum Uruvaakkina Pon, Velli, Kal Ivaigalukku Dheyvam Oppaayirukkumendru Naam Ninaikkalaagaadhu.
30 ariyaamaiyulla Kaalangalai Dhevan Kaanaadhavarpolirundhaar; Ippozhudho Mananthirumbavendumendru Engumulla Manusharellaarukkum Kattalaiyidugiraar.

31 melum Oru Naalaik Kuriththirukkiraar; Adhile Avar Thaam Niyamiththa Manushanaikkondu, Poologaththai Needhiyaai Niyaayantheerppaar; Andha Manushanai Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppinadhinaale Adhin Nichchayaththai Ellaarukkum Vilangappanninaar Endraan.
32 mariththorin Uyirththezhudhalaikkuriththu Avargal Kettapozhudhu, Silar Igazhndhaargal. Silar: Nee Sollugiradhai Innoruvelai Ketpom Endraargal.
33 ippadiyirukka, Pavul Avargalai Vittup Poivittaan.

34 silar Avanaip Patrikkondu, Visuvaasigalaanaargal. Avargalil Maarsmedaiyin Niyaayaadhipadhigalil Oruvanaagiya Thiyoneesiyu Enbavanum, Thaamari Ennum Perulla Oru Sthireeyum, Ivargaludane Veru Silarum Irundhaargal.
